alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Western Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 5:53AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Marion and south central Putnam Counties through 630 AM EDT... At 552 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Juniper Springs, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Ocala, Salt Springs, Juniper Springs, Lynne, Santos, Anthony, Silver Springs Shores, Ocala Airport and Burbank. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Western Marion
